Title: The Blacksmith's Fate
Description:
While we're here, I must find out what happened to my old friend, Ryton Blackholme. He was Hallowfall's finest blacksmith--and he was taken in a surprise nerubian attack. I could not save him.

I searched for him, but found nothing except for his bloodied helm. I'd given up hope. But recently, I heard rumor about a blacksmith from a survivor who'd been pulled down off the Aegis Wall.

Could it be Ryton? Will you help me, $n?
ObjectivesText: Assist Faerin Lothar to uncover the fate of Ryton Blackholme.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Give the blacksmith's breastplate to Faerin.
CompletionText: Thank you for your help with this, $n.
RewardText:
I can't believe Ryton is really gone, but it means the world to finally know what happened to my dear friend.

We will honor him as soon as we've dealt with Zev'kall's monstrosity.
